CourtHearing.description: The schema of an individual court hearing. This is what gets bundled in an includes or GET /court_hearings/:id response

id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this object
The universally unique and sequential primary identifier for this entity

case_number.description: The third party reference for the case of the current hearing

nomis_case_id.description: The nomis reference for the case of the current hearing.

nomis_hearing_id.description: After a new hearing is created in Nomis backend it receives a unique id. This can be null and means we failed to create a corresponding hearing in Nomis or did not need too.

saved_to_nomis.description: Indicates whether we successfully created a corresponding court hearing in Nomis' backend.

case_type.description: The type of the court that the court hearing is being held in.

comments.example: Witness for Joe Bloggs in Foo Bar court hearing.
comments.description: Arbitrary comments that are useful for humans but not touched by computers.

case_start_date.description: ISO8601-compatible date indicating when the case started.

move.description: Reference to the move entity that is associated with this court hearing.
